name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in building scalable solutions using **Golang**, **SQL**, and **data warehousing**. Demonstrated expertise in integrating **Nats**, **Kafka**, and **blockchain** technologies, while designing and developing robust **APIs**. Adept in monitoring and optimizing applications utilizing **Prometheus** and **Grafana** within cloud environments such as **AWS**. Proven track record of employing agile methodologies to enhance productivity and ensure flexibility in team settings.

Original strengths include delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics and automation, while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong MLOps background, utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for managing model lifecycle. Known for commitment to clean code practices, effective testing strategies, and exceptional communication and teamwork skills.
